title: Feature: Create a simple scheduler for manager
body:

No

### Describe the feature you are requesting, as well as the possible use case(s) for it.

The manager should be able to schedule jobs on workers depending on their allocation and type of workload

title: Feature: Enable Manager to communicate with worker using supermq
body:
### Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.

No

### Describe the feature you are requesting, as well as the possible use case(s) for it.

The manager should be able to communicate with workers to be able to send jobs and receive results from them. This will be enabled by using SuperMQ under the hood.

### Indicate the importance of this feature to you.

Must-have

### Anything else?

_No response_
author: rodneyosodo

comments.body: This should not be a separate issue - it is Manager service.

title: Feature: Enable worker to delete a job
body:
### Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.

No

### Describe the feature you are requesting, as well as the possible use case(s) for it.

Worker should be able to delete a job. This should be synchronised with the manager i.e. once the manager has deleted the job the worker should delete it. Consider handling edge cases. For example, when the job fails to be deleted on the worker it has been deleted on the manager.

### Indicate the importance of this feature to you.

Must-have

### Anything else?

_No response_
author: rodneyosodo

comments.body: Why should Proplet know what the Job is? It shouldjust receive a batch of tasks and execute them. In any case this functionality should be implemented in other issues describing Manager and Proplet services.
